text: @dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn Brian, are you illiterate or just stupid?  Obviously you did not have any expectations from the Obama Administration. To ruin an innocent man like Gen. Flynn was & is unconscionable as is you’re inferring that our President didn’t care about Covid19 fatalities.
